amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill to implement, administer, or enforce the economic embargo of Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to implement, administer, or enforce the economic embargo of Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 226 (Roll no. 333).
